pr_title: Invocation of registerHandlerInterceptor() can cause duplicate event processors

timeline.message: Prevent duplicate creation of tracking event processors on registerHandlerInterceptor.
New test to verify that customizing the event processing configuration for sagas does not lead to events being handled twice.

timeline.bodyText:
SagaCustomizationIntegrationTest?
Also, it wouldn't hurt to add JavaDoc stating what is actually being tested.
timeline.author: m1l4n54v1c

timeline.message: Added description of the purpose of the test
